title: Exquisite Diamond and Emerald Bridal Haaram - Har731
materials: High-purity Gold (129.160 gms) with a dazzling array of brilliant-cut Diamonds (17.85 carats
1171 stones) and vibrant Emerald accents (2.37 carats
1 stone). Features a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This grand Haaram showcases traditional Telugu craftsmanship with meticulously placed diamonds in an elaborate floral motif. Features circular segments that accentuate a center locket, each adorned with delicate floral detailing. Green Emeralds are used strategically to add contrast and visual appeal. The pendant also features round gold beads.
colors: Predominantly Gold and White (Diamonds) with striking Green Emerald accents. Hints of red due to Rubies.
occasions: or any occasion where you want to make a stunning statement. Also suitable for elaborate half-saree functions and traditional celebrations.
description: This Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and exceptional craftsmanship. The generous use of high-quality diamonds and vibrant emeralds ensures a breathtaking sparkle. The traditional design reflects the rich cultural heritage of South India, making it a cherished heirloom. The superior Hyderabadi polish guarantees lasting luster and durability. Ideal for the bride seeking a traditional yet luxurious statement piece. It also blends modern jewelry techniques.
